n0.text: Into which of the following categories does the examined item fall? (1)

n1.text: Was the film published or communicated to the public within 50 years from the fixation?

query.assumption: No information provided concerning the country of the companies  registered office, central administration, or principal place of business: assuming EEA

n10.text: In which country does it have its registered office, central administration, or principal place of business?

query.assumption: No information provided concerning the country in which the database was formed: assuming EEA.

n11.text: In which country does it have its registered office?

query.assumption: No information provided concerning the country in which the database was formed: assuming EEA.

n12.text: Are its operations genuinely linked on an ongoing basis with the economy of an EEA state?

n13.text: The sui generis database right has expired. Please note a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights, such as any underlying literary or artistic work (including any relevant original database), apply.

n14.text: The sui generis database right has not expired. Please contact the right-holder before use.

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date at which the programme was first broadcasted

n15.text: Was the programme first broadcast more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: No information provided about the first communication of the Performance: assuming it has been communicated within 50 years from the date of the performance.

n16.text: Was a fixation of the performance published or communicated to the public within 50 years from the date of the performance?

query.assumption: Assuming the dc:issued represents the date of first communication to the public

n17.text: Was the fixation published or communicated to the public more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming the dc:issued represents the date of first communication to the public

n18.text: Did the performance take place more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: No information provided about the date of creation: assuming that the Phonogram has been published within 50 years of its creation

n19.text: Was the phonogram published within 50 years of creation?

n2.text: Was the film published or communicated to the public more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date the phonogram was first published
query.query: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {  ?a a %(pdcalc:Audio)s ; dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +50 <  year(now()) )  } }

n20.text: Was the phonogram published more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: No information provided about the date of creation: assuming that the Phonogram has been published within 50 years of its creation

n21.text: Was the phonogram communicated to the public within 50 years of creation?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date the phonogram was created(which in this case it will not, more information is needed in the metadata to make a proper determination)
query.query: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {  ?a a %(pdcalc:Audio)s ; dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +50 <  year(now()) )  } }

n22.text: Was the phonogram created more than 50 years ago?

n23.text: Copyright in the examined work has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any other relevant literary or artistic work, producers’ rights in any relevant phonogram, performers’ rights in any performance that may be fixated in such a phonogram, broadcasting organisations’ rights over a relevant broadcast, any relevant database rights or other sui generis rights have expired.  (12)

query.assumption: Assuming that a work with no Author + bio/event is an Anonymous/Pseudonymous/Legal entity work (we do not take into account works with an unknown author which would result in an undefinable copyright status)

Assuming that a work with no Author + bio/event is an Anonymous/Pseudonymous/Legal entity work (we do not take into account works with an unknown author which would result in an undefinable copyright status)

n24.text: What type of author (6) does this work have?

query.assumption: Assuming that the author's place of residence or nationality is EEA since no info is provided in the metadata

n25.text: What is the nationality, place of residence or place of establishment of the author?

n26.text: What is the country of origin (9) of this work?

query.assumption: The presence of a work on bibliographica consitutes availablity to the public

n27.text: Has the work been make available to the public?

n28.text: Copyright in the examined work has not expired. Please contact the right-holder before use.

n29.text: Due to lack of the necessary information, copyright status cannot be determined.

n3.text: The related right of the producer of the phonogram has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any underlying literary or artistic work or performers’ rights in any performance that may be fixated in the phonogram.

query.assumption: since No info provided about the date of first publication nor the date of creation: assuming that the work was not published more than 70 years after its creation

n30.text: Was the work published more than 70 years after creation?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the creation date of the work (probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {{ ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }}. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +70 <  year(now()) )   }

n31.text: Was the work created more than 70 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date which the work was first made available to the public (probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +70 <  year(now()) )   }

n32.text: Was the work published more than 70 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication or communication for the work (probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +25 <  year(now()) )   }

n33.text: Was the work published or communicated to the public more than 25 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that the author place of residence or nationality is EEA since no info is provided in the metadata

n34.text: What is the nationality or place of residence of the author?

query.assumption: Assuming that the country of origin of the work is EEA since no info is provided in the metadata
Assuming that the country of origin of the work is EEA since no info is provided in the metadata
Assuming that the country of origin of the work is EEA since no info is provided in the metadata

n35.text: What is the country of origin (9) of this work?

query.assumption: Assuming that the nationality of the author is Berne Trips since no info is provided in the metadata

n36.text: What is nationality or place of residence of the author?

n37.text: The Rule of Shorter Term (Comparison of Terms) applies. This means that the term of protection is that established by the legislation of the selected country, unless (barring provisions to the contrary in the legislation of that country) the term fixed in the country of origin of the work is shorter. In such cases, the term of protection is that of the country of origin.

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date the phonogram was first communicated to the public(which in this case it will not, more information is needed in the metadata to make a proper determination)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {  ?a a %(pdcalc:Audio)s ; dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +50 <  year(now()) )  } }

n38.text: Was the phonogram communicated to the public more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming the dc:issued represents the date at which the Database was communicated to the public
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {  ?a a %(pdcalc:Database)s ; dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +15 >  year(now()) )  } }

n39.text: Was the database made available to the public in the last 15 years?

n4.text: The related right of the producer of the phonogram has not expired. Please contact the right-holder before use.

query.assumption: There is no metadata about dates of completion or substantial changes to a database so dc:issued is used in place of this data but this is almost certianly a bad assumption
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {  ?a a %(pdcalc:Database)s ; dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +15 >  year(now()) )  } }

n40.text: Was the database completed or sustantially changed within the last 15 years?

query.assumption: assuming that if there is not more than one bio:birth in the metadata then the work is not a collective work

n41.text: Is the work a collective work?

n42.text: Did the last surviving author (11) die more than 70 years ago?

query.assumption: The presence of a work on bibliographica consitutes communication to the public

n43.text: Has the work been made available to the public?

query.assumption: since No info provided about the date of first publication : assuming that the work was published within 70 years of the death of the last surviving author

n44.text: Was the work published within 70 years of the death of the last surviving author (11)?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication or communication for the work (probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {{ ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }}. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b)) +25 <  year(now()) )   }

n45.text: Was the work published or communicated to the public more than 25 years ago?

query.assumption: Assumming that if the author died in the years 1936-1942 that they died for france in WWII( likely a bad assumption)
query.template: prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask {   ?c a bio:Death ; bio:date ?d . FILTER (1939 <= year(xsd:dateTime(?d)) && 1945 >= year(xsd:dateTime(?d))) }

n46.text: Did the author die for France during WWI or WWII?

query.assumption: Assuming that the work is a musical work if its dewey notation is within the range of 780 - 790

n47.text: Is the work a musical work?

query.assumption: Assuming that the work is a musical work if its dewey notation is within the range of 780 - 790

n48.text: Is the work a musical work?

n49.text: Did the last surviving author (11) die more than 100 years ago?

n5.text: Was the film first fixated more than 50 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication and that the work was not in the public domain on or before feb 3 1919(probably wrong assumption?)

n50.text: Was the work published before 1921 and not in the public domain on February 3th 1919?

query.template: prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?x a bio:Death ; bio:date ?y . FILTER ( year(xsd:dateTime(?d)) +115 <   year(now()) ) } }

n51.text: Did the last surviving author (11) die more than 115 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication and that the work was not in the public domain on or before August 13th 1941(probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {{ ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }}. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b))<  1948 )   }

n52.text: Was the work published before 1948 and not in the public domain on August 13th 1941

query.template: prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?x a bio:Death ; bio:date ?y . FILTER ( year(xsd:dateTime(?d)) +109 <   year(now()) ) } }

n53.text: Did the last surviving author (11) die more than 109 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication and that the work was not in the public domain on or before feb 3 1919(probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {{ ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }}. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b))<  1921 )   }

n54.text: Was the work published before 1921 and not in the public domain on February 3th 1919?

query.template: prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?x a bio:Death ; bio:date ?y . FILTER ( year(xsd:dateTime(?d)) +85 <   year(now()) ) } }

n55.text: Did the last surviving author die more than 85 years ago?

query.assumption: Assuming that dc:issued represents the date of first publication and that the work was not in the public domain on or before August 13th 1941(probably wrong assumption?)
query.template: prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { {{ ?a a %(pdcalc:Book)s } UNION { ?a a %(pdcalc:Document)s }}. ?a dc:issued ?b.  FILTER (year(xsd:dateTime(?b))<  1948 )   }

n56.text: Was the work published before 1948 and not in the public domain on August 13th 1941

query.template: prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> Ask { { ?x a bio:Death ; bio:date ?y . FILTER ( year(xsd:dateTime(?d)) +79 <   year(now()) ) } }

n58.text: The related right of the film producer in the first fixation of the film has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any cinematographic or audiovisual work which might be fixated in the film.

n59.text: The related right of the producer of the film producer in the first fixation of the film has not expired. Please contact the right-holder before use.

query.assumption: No information provided concerning the nationality of the right holder: assuming EEA.

n6.text: Of which countries is the right-holder a national or resident?

n60.text: The related right of the broadcasting organisation in this broadcast has expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any underlying literary or artistic work, producers’ rights in any relevant phonogram or performers’ rights in any performance that may be fixated in such a phonogram.

n61.text: The related right of the broadcasting organisation in this broadcast has not expired. Please contact the right- holder before use.

n62.text: The related rights of the performers in the fixation of the performance have expired. Please note that a single item might be protected by multiple layers of rights. You may need to apply the Public Domain Calculator again to examine whether additional rights apply, such as copyright protection in any underlying literary or artistic work or producers’ rights in any relevant phonogram.

n63.text: The related right of the performers in the fixation of the performance have not expired. Please contact the right- holder before use.
